description:
Introduction to operating system concepts: process, CPU scheduling, memory management, file system and storage, and multi-threaded programming.
Prereq: 2421, or 2451 and ECE 2560; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Data Analytics, Engr Physics, or ECE major. Not open to students with credit for 5431.

Prereq: 2421, or 2451 and ECE 2560; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Data Analytics, Engr Physics, or ECE major. Not open to students with credit for 5431.
